name: SoundBarrier (danielroskaft, MartinBremer, Klaere)
description:
SoundBarrier is a platforming game set in a distant future where music is powerful enough to make you jump, literally.

Based on the tempo, the beat will make you jump automatically, so time your movement and dash through levels to beat the deadly laser chasing behind you.

Credits:

SoundBarrier was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Games a Week"  (SummerSemester 2020)

Made by:
